 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָדָה‎</span> **verb** ==pass on, advance== (Arabic (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***pass by***, also ***run*** = Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***pass by***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עדי‎</span> ***go along, go by*** (often for Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָבַר‎</span>, Aph\`el ***remove***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***pass by, come***, with <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***fall upon***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָדָה‎</span> [[Job.28.8|Job 28:8]] the fierce lion ***hath not advanced*** upon it (that is, the way). **Hiph\`il** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעֲדֶה בֶּגֶד‎</span> [[Prov.25.20|Prov 25:20]] ***removing a garment*** (compare [[Prov.38.19|Prov 38:19]] [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]], [[Jonah.3.6|Jonah 3:6]] Hebrew and [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]]). 



 II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָדָה‎</span> **verb** ==ornament, deck oneself== (Aramaic in derivatives <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִידּוּת‎</span>, ***ornament***; compare perhaps <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲדִיתָא‎</span>, ***scurf, scab***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***mange, scab***, etc. [as sheathing, orexcrescence ?], also <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***broad stone*** for covering grave, etc., [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>1979</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 2 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְעָדִית‎</span> [[Ezek.23.40|Ezek 23:40]] ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּעְדֶּה‎</span> [[Isa.61.10|Isa 61:10]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתַּ֫עַד‎</span> [[Hos.2.15|Hos 2:15]] 2 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּעְדִּי‎</span> [[Jer.4.30|Jer 4:30]]; [[Jer.31.4|Jer 31:4]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתַּעְדִּי‎</span> [[Ezek.16.13|Ezek 16:13]] 1 singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָאֶעְדֵךְ‎</span> v[[Ezek.16.11|Ezek 16:11]] ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲדֵהנָֿא‎</span> [[Job.40.10|Job 40:10]] — ***ornament***; usually 

**1. a.** ==reflexive==, ***deck oneself*** with, with accusative of (woman's) ornaments, of bride [[Isa.61.10|Isa 61:10]] (simile; compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִלְבִּישׁ‎</span> va); figurative of Israel [[Hos.2.15|Hos 2:15]]; [[Jer.31.4|Jer 31:4]] Jerusalem [[Jer.4.30|Jer 4:30]] (with accusative of cognate meaning; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָבַשׁ‎</span>), [[Ezek.16.13|Ezek 16:13]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַלְבּוּשֵׁךְ‎</span> in \|\| clause), [[Ezek.23.40|Ezek 23:40]] (with accusative of congnate meaning with verb). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** metaphor, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲדֵהנָֿא גָאוֺן וגוי‎</span> [[Job.40.10|Job 40:10]] ***deck now thyself*** [Job] ***with majesty***. 

**2.** with 2. accusative, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָאֶעְדֵךְ עֶ֑דִי‎</span> [[Ezek.16.11|Ezek 16:11]] ***and I decked thee*** [Jerusalem] ***with finery*** (? read **Hiph\`il** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָאַ‎</span>).
